Question.Subject: Paypal combine two gift disposable credit card ?
Question.Content: Can i combine two gift / disposable credit cards plus my paypal balance to buy something for an example 1 $100 gift credit card and 1 $50 gift credit card plus 50$ in my paypal to buy a 200 dollar item on ebay thank you sooo much but can i combine them like all three into one payment
Question.ChosenAnswer: Only if the gift cards are from Visa, Master Card, Discover or Amex! It's still going to be difficult to split payments across several cards like that!

Answer.Content: Only if the gift cards are from Visa, Master Card, Discover or Amex! It's still going to be difficult to split payments across several cards like that!
